### Tender Details
#### S77 AHU 159 Replacement

- **Tender Title**: S77 AHU 159 Replacement
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01003969
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: 22-58038
- **Publication Date**: August 11, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: September 8, 2022, 14:00
- **Original Tender Package**: [Available on the Canada Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/11/5db757aba710a2b455d4456198a25c54/22-58038_english_spec_elec_mec_tender_20220601_1.pdf)

### Bidding Requirements
To bid on this project, firms must obtain the tender documents through the Buyandsell.gc.ca TMA services provider. Addenda, when issued, will be available on the same platform. Firms choosing to base their bids on tender documents obtained from other sources do so at their own risk.

### Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for August 17 and 18, 2022, at 9:00am. Bidders are required to attend one of the scheduled site visits to view the site and participate in the visit. It is mandatory that the bidder's representative attends and signs the attendance form prior to leaving the site.

### Security Requirements
As a condition of this tender, the contractor must possess a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (DSIC). Contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must have a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by DSIC. Contractor must also comply with the Security Requirements Checklist attached at Appendix “D.”

### Contract Clauses
The Office of the Procurement Ombudsman (OPO) was established by the Government of Canada to provide an independent venue for Canadian bidders to raise complaints regarding the award of federal contracts. For more information, visit the OPO website.
